abstract: Procter & Gamble reports quarterly earnings of $521 million, or 18 cents a share, as higher prices help offset decline in shipment volume; reports worse-than-expected revenue of $17.79 billion, down 9 percent from year-earlier period; shares close down 4 percent.
lead_paragraph: Procter & Gamble’s sales fell for the sixth straight quarter as it was weighed down by softer sales volume and unfavorable currency exchange rates.

headline.main: Procter & Gamble Earnings Hurt by Low Sales Volume
headline.print_headline: Procter & Gamble Earnings Hurt by Low Sales Volume

snippet: Procter & Gamble’s sales fell for the sixth straight quarter as it was weighed down by softer sales volume and unfavorable currency exchange rates.
